input: Yasser Arafat will meet Shimon Peres in Gaza on Thursday after Palestinians said the right-wing Israeli government had barred the Palestinian leader from flying to the West Bank for talks with the former prime minister .
output: Yasser <B-PER> Arafat <I-PER> will meet Shimon <B-PER> Peres <I-PER> in Gaza <B-LOC> on Thursday after Palestinians <B-MISC> said the right-wing Israeli <B-MISC> government had barred the Palestinian <B-MISC> leader from flying to the West <B-LOC> Bank <I-LOC> for talks with the former prime minister .
